00025 /* Deal with an ICC annoyance.  It tries hard to pretend to be GCC<
00026    but doesn't understand its attributes properly. */
00027 #ifdef __ICC
00028 # define __gcc_attribute__(x)
00029 #else
00030 # define __gcc_attribute__ __attribute__
00031 #endif
